languages.text: "У тебя нет альтернатив, Ризза. Если сдашь Футфол Чорда и сбежишь, где будешь сбывать товар? Пополнять припасы? Вы просто медленно сдохнете без снарядов, воды и воздуха. Так что кончай торговаться с судьбой и следуй плану".

"You have no other options, Ryzza. If you abandon Footfall to Chorda and flee, where are you going to sell your goods? Or restock your supplies? It will just be a slow death for all of you, with no ammunition, no water, and no air. So quit bargaining with fate and stick to the plan."
languages.original_text: "У тебя нет альтернатив, Ризза. Если сдашь Футфол Чорда и сбежишь, где будешь сбывать товар? Пополнять припасы? Вы просто медленно сдохнете без снарядов, воды и воздуха. Так что кончай торговаться с судьбой и следуй плану".

traits.locale_text: "You have no other options, Ryzza. If you abandon Footfall to Chorda and flee, where are you going to sell your goods? Or restock your supplies? It will just be a slow death for all of you: no missiles, no water, no air. So quit bargaining with the inevitable and follow the plan."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "You have no other options, Ryzza. If you abandon Footfall to Chorda and flee, where are you going to sell your goods? Or restock your supplies? It will just be a slow death for all of you, with no ammunition, no water, and no air. So quit bargaining with fate and stick to the plan."

traits.locale_text: "You have no other options, Ryzza. If you abandon Footfall to Chorda and flee, where are you going to sell your goods? Or restock your supplies? It will just be a slow death for all of you, with no ammunition, no water, and no air. So quit bargaining with fate and stick to the plan."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “你已经无路可走了，莱萨。如果你放弃落脚港，从库尔达手下逃脱，那你要去哪里卖你那堆东西？或者去哪里弄到补给？你们所有人都会慢慢丧命，没有弹药，没有水，也没有空气。所以别再徒劳地讨价还价了，就按这个计划来吧。”
languages.original_text: "You have no other options, Ryzza. If you abandon Footfall to Chorda and flee, where are you going to sell your goods? Or restock your supplies? It will just be a slow death for all of you, with no ammunition, no water, and no air. So quit bargaining with fate and stick to the plan."

traits.locale_text: “你已经无路可走了，莱萨。如果你放弃落脚港，从库尔达手下逃脱，那你要去哪里卖你那堆东西？或者去哪里弄到补给？你们所有人都会慢慢丧命，没有导弹，没有水，也没有空气。所以别再徒劳地讨价还价了，就按这个计划来吧。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「ライツァ、君に他の選択肢はない。フットフォールをチョーダに任せ、逃げるのなら、これからは何処でお前の商品を売るんだ？何処で入荷をするんだ？全員がジワジワと死んでいくだけだ。弾薬もない、水もない、空気もない。運命との駆け引きをやめて、計画を進めるんだ」
languages.original_text: "You have no other options, Ryzza. If you abandon Footfall to Chorda and flee, where are you going to sell your goods? Or restock your supplies? It will just be a slow death for all of you, with no ammunition, no water, and no air. So quit bargaining with fate and stick to the plan."

traits.locale_text: 「ライツァ、君に他の選択肢はない。フットフォールをチョーダに任せ、逃げるのなら、これからは何処でお前の商品を売るんだ？何処で入荷をするんだ？全員がジワジワと死んでいくだけだ。ミサイルもない、水もない、空気もない。不可能な駆け引きはやめて、計画を進めるんだ」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «No tiene otra opción, Ryzza. Si abandona Paso a manos de Chorda y huye, ¿dónde venderá su mercancía o se reabastecerá? Será una muerte lenta para todos: sin munición, sin agua y sin aire. Deje de negociar con el destino y siga el plan».
languages.original_text: "You have no other options, Ryzza. If you abandon Footfall to Chorda and flee, where are you going to sell your goods? Or restock your supplies? It will just be a slow death for all of you, with no ammunition, no water, and no air. So quit bargaining with fate and stick to the plan."

traits.locale_text: «No tiene otra opción, Ryzza. Si abandona Paso a manos de Chorda y huye, ¿dónde venderá su mercancía o se reabastecerá? Será una muerte lenta para todos; sin misiles, sin agua, sin aire. Así que deje de negociar lo inevitable y siga el plan».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Ihr habt keine anderen Optionen, Ryzza. Wenn Ihr Footfall Chorda überlasst und flieht, wo wollt Ihr dann Eure Waren verkaufen? Oder Eure Vorräte auffüllen? Das wird einfach nur ein langsamer Tod für Euch alle. Keine Munition, kein Wasser, keine Luft. Also hört auf, mit dem Schicksal zu feilschen, und haltet Euch an den Plan."
languages.original_text: "You have no other options, Ryzza. If you abandon Footfall to Chorda and flee, where are you going to sell your goods? Or restock your supplies? It will just be a slow death for all of you, with no ammunition, no water, and no air. So quit bargaining with fate and stick to the plan."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt keine anderen Optionen, Ryzza. Wenn Ihr Footfall Chorda überlasst und flieht, wo wollt Ihr dann Eure Waren verkaufen? Oder Eure Vorräte auffüllen? Das wird einfach nur ein langsamer Tod für Euch alle. Keine Raketen, kein Wasser, keine Luft. Also hört auf, mit dem Unvermeidlichen zu feilschen, und haltet Euch an den Plan."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Vous n'avez pas le choix, Ryzza. Si vous abandonnez Castel à Chorda en prenant la fuite, où irez-vous vendre vos marchandises ? Où vous réapprovisionnerez-vous ? Vos hommes et vous serez condamnés à une mort lente : plus de munitions, plus d'eau, plus d'air... Alors, cessez de retarder l'inévitable et suivez le plan à la lettre. »
languages.original_text: "You have no other options, Ryzza. If you abandon Footfall to Chorda and flee, where are you going to sell your goods? Or restock your supplies? It will just be a slow death for all of you, with no ammunition, no water, and no air. So quit bargaining with fate and stick to the plan."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez pas le choix, Ryzza. Si vous abandonnez Castel à Chorda en prenant la fuite, où irez-vous vendre vos marchandises ? Où vous réapprovisionnerez-vous ? Vous et vos hommes serez condamnés à une mort lente : plus de missiles, plus d'eau, plus d'air... Alors cessez de repousser l'inévitable et suivez le plan à la lettre. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Başka seçeneğin yok Ryzza. Binliman'ı Chorda'ya bırakıp kaçarsan mallarını nerede satacaksın? Nasıl tedarik yapacaksın? Merminiz bitecek, suyunuz tükenecek, havasız kalacaksınız. Yavaş yavaş ölüp gideceksiniz. O yüzden kaderinle pazarlık etmeyi bırakıp plana uygun davran."
languages.original_text: "You have no other options, Ryzza. If you abandon Footfall to Chorda and flee, where are you going to sell your goods? Or restock your supplies? It will just be a slow death for all of you, with no ammunition, no water, and no air. So quit bargaining with fate and stick to the plan."
